Cell.Data: This contains original text meant for subtitles. Use descriptive expressions like <frantic laughter> and ## for a new line.
This contains text for subtitles. Use descriptive expressions like <frantic laughter> and ## for a new line.
set to "LOCKED" if this string is final.
Take advantage of your environment and tools in combat.
Take advantage of your environment and tools in combat.

Take advantage of your environment and tools in combat. You do not have to fight every enemy head on. Use alternate routes to sneak past tough enemies, or to get the drop on them.

If you intend to fight, disabling enemies first with tools like the GLOO cannon can increase your odds of surviving.

Take advantage of your environment and tools in combat. You do not have to fight every enemy head on. Use alternate routes to sneak past tough enemies, or to get the drop on them.

If you intend to fight, disabling enemies first with tools like the GLOO cannon can increase your odds of surviving.
Press %player:sneak% to sneak if you wish to avoid direct confrontation.
Press %player:sneak% to sneak if you wish to avoid direct confrontation.

Press %player:sneak% to sneak if you wish to avoid direct confrontation. While sneaking you move silently and can hide behind cover to avoid being spotted. As enemies detect you, a meter will appear over them. White means they are suspicious. Red means you’re busted.

Unaware enemies take more damage from your attacks.

Press %player:sneak% to sneak if you wish to avoid direct confrontation. While sneaking you move silently and can hide behind cover to avoid being spotted. As enemies detect you, a meter will appear over them. White means they are suspicious. Red means you’re busted.

Unaware enemies take more damage from your attacks.
Press %contextaction% to view information about zero-g.
Press %contextaction% to view information about zero-g.

Your TranStar suit is equipped with a propulsion system to navigate the harsh environment of space. To navigate in Zero-G, use %default:xi_movex% to thrust and %player:sprint% to boost thrust. Press %player:leanleft% + %player:leanright% to brake.

You can press %player:jump% to ascend and %player:sneak% to descend. Hold %player:leanleft% or %player:leanright% to roll.

Your TranStar suit is equipped with a propulsion system to navigate the harsh environment of space. To navigate in Zero-G, use %default:xi_movex% to thrust and %player:sprint% to boost thrust. Press %player:leanleft% + %player:leanright% to brake.

You can press %player:jump% to ascend and %player:sneak% to descend. Hold %player:leanleft% or %player:leanright% to roll.

Your TranStar suit is equipped with a propulsion system to navigate the harsh environment of space. To navigate in Zero-G, use %default:moveforward%, %default:moveleft%, %default:moveback%, or %default:moveright% to thrust and %player:sprint% to boost thrust. Press %player:leanleft% + %player:leanright% to brake.

You can press %player:jump% to ascend and %player:sneak% to descend. Hold %player:leanright% or %player:leanleft% to roll.

Your TranStar suit is equipped with a propulsion system to navigate the harsh environment of space. To navigate in Zero-G, use %default:moveforward%, %default:moveleft%, %default:moveback%, or %default:moveright% to thrust and %player:sprint% to boost thrust. Press %player:leanleft% + %player:leanright% to brake.

You can press %player:jump% to ascend and %player:sneak% to descend. Hold %player:leanright% or %player:leanleft% to roll.
The Psychoscope allows you to scan Typhon to learn new abilities.
The Psychoscope allows you to scan Typhon to learn new abilities.
Toggle your Psychoscope with %player:toggle_scope% to mark and scan nearby enemies. Scanning Typhon reveals new abilities you can acquire by installing Neuromods.
Toggle your Psychoscope with %player:toggle_scope% to mark and scan nearby enemies. Scanning Typhon reveals new abilities you can acquire by installing Neuromods.
The Quick Select menu allows you to assign weapons and powers for easy access.
The Quick Select menu allows you to assign weapons and powers for easy access.

The Quick Select menu allows you to quickly alternate between weapons and powers. Assign weapons and powers from your inventory or favorites wheel by selecting the item or skill, then pressing a number key to assign.

The Quick Select menu allows you to quickly alternate between weapons and powers. Assign weapons and powers from your inventory or favorites wheel by selecting the item or skill, then pressing a number key to assign.

The Quick Select menu allows you to quickly alternate between weapons and powers. Assign weapons and powers to the Quick Select menu by highlighting the items in your inventory, then press %menu:menu_examine% to bring up the assign menu. Assign from your favorites wheel by selecting, then using %focusmode:quickselect_left% %focusmode:quickselect_right% or %focusmode:quickselect_down%.

The Quick Select menu allows you to quickly alternate between weapons and powers. Assign weapons and powers to the Quick Select menu by highlighting the items in your inventory, then press %menu:menu_examine% </font>to bring up the assign menu. Assign from your favorites wheel by selecting, then using %focusmode:quickselect_left% %focusmode:quickselect_right% or %focusmode:quickselect_down%.

Fabricators use Fabrication Plans to create dozens of useful items aboard Talos I.

Each item fabricated consumes some combination of Organic, Mineral, Synthetic, and Exotic materials. Search Talos I to find plans and materials.

Fabricators use Fabrication Plans to create dozens of useful items aboard Talos I.

Each item fabricated consumes some combination of Organic, Mineral, Synthetic, and Exotic materials. Search Talos I to find plans and materials.

The Hacking skill allows you to bypass security systems protecting keypads, workstations, and security stations. At higher skill levels, you can hack into robotic systems such as turrets and Operators.

To hack, use %hacking:hack_moveprompt_y% to quickly navigate the bitstream to reach the target. Once inside the target, press the prompted button to complete the hack.

The Hacking skill allows you to bypass security systems protecting keypads, workstations, and security stations. At higher skill levels, you can hack into robotic systems such as turrets and Operators.

To hack, use %hacking:hack_moveprompt_y% to quickly navigate the bitstream to reach the target. Once inside the target, press the prompted button to complete the hack.

The Hacking skill allows you to bypass security systems protecting keypads, workstations, and security stations. At higher skill levels, you can hack into robotic systems such as turrets and Operators.

To hack, use %hacking:hack_moveup%, %hacking:hack_movedown%, %hacking:hack_moveright%, and %hacking:hack_moveleft% to quickly navigate the bitstream to reach the target. Once inside the target, press the prompted button to complete the hack.

The Hacking skill allows you to bypass security systems protecting keypads, workstations, and security stations. At higher skill levels, you can hack into robotic systems such as turrets and Operators.

To hack, use %hacking:hack_moveup%, %hacking:hack_movedown%, %hacking:hack_moveright%, and %hacking:hack_moveleft% to quickly navigate the bitstream to reach the target. Once inside the target, press the prompted button to complete the hack.
Use %default:xi_movey% to move around in the world.
Use %default:xi_movey% to move around in the world.
Use %default:moveforward%, %default:moveleft%, %default:moveback%, and %default:moveright%, to move around in the world.
Use %default:moveforward%, %default:moveleft%, %default:moveback%, and %default:moveright%, to move around in the world.
Use %player:jump% to jump and %player:sprint% to sprint. Press %player:sneak% to crouch or to slide while sprinting.
Use %player:jump% to jump and %player:sprint% to sprint. Press %player:sneak% to crouch or to slide while sprinting.
Use %player:jump% to jump and %player:sprint% to sprint. Press %player:sneak% to crouch or to slide while sprinting.
Use %player:jump% to jump and %player:sprint% to sprint. Press %player:sneak% to crouch or to slide while sprinting.
The Neuromod is a revolutionary TranStar invention that allows you to learn new skills and abilities. Press %player:togglepda% to open your TranScribe and navigate to the Neuromods section.
The Neuromod is a revolutionary TranStar invention that allows you to learn new skills and abilities. Press %player:togglepda% to open your TranScribe and navigate to the Neuromods section.
The Neuromod is a revolutionary TranStar invention that allows you to learn new skills and abilities. Press %player:toggleabilities% to open your TranScribe and navigate to the Neuromods section.
The Neuromod is a revolutionary TranStar invention that allows you to learn new skills and abilities. Press %player:toggleabilities% to open your TranScribe and navigate to the Neuromods section.
There are often multiple ways to solve problems in Prey.
There are often multiple ways to solve problems in Prey.

Experiment with different approaches to overcome challenges and enemies. You can get past the locked door by:

»Searching for the keycard
»Finding an alternate path.

As you learn new abilities, more options will become available to you.

Experiment with different approaches to overcome challenges and enemies. You can get past the locked door by:

»Searching for the keycard
»Finding an alternate path.

As you learn new abilities, more options will become available to you.
The Favorites Wheel allows you to quickly switch between weapons and other items.
The Favorites Wheel allows you to quickly switch between weapons and other items.

The favorites wheel allows you to quickly select and use weapons and, eventually, psi powers. Press %player:mouse_enter_focusmode% to open the favorites wheel and select a weapon or item using %player:mouse_enter_focusmode%. Press %focusmode:mouse_select_item% to equip a weapon.

You can also consume medkits and psi hypos from the favorites wheel.

The favorites wheel allows you to quickly select and use weapons and, eventually, psi powers. Press %player:mouse_enter_focusmode% to open the favorites wheel and select a weapon or item using %player:mouse_enter_focusmode%. Press %focusmode:mouse_select_item% to equip a weapon.

You can also consume medkits and psi hypos from the favorites wheel.

The favorites wheel allows you to quickly select and equip weapons and, eventually, psi powers. Hold %player:enter_focusmode% to open the favorites wheel and use %focusmode:controller_left_menu_rotate_yaw% to select a weapon. Release %focusmode:controller_select_item% to equip a weapon.

You can also consume medkits and psi hypos from the favorites wheel.

The favorites wheel allows you to quickly select and equip weapons and, eventually, psi powers. Hold %player:enter_focusmode% to open the favorites wheel and use %focusmode:controller_left_menu_rotate_yaw% to select a weapon. Release %focusmode:controller_select_item% to equip a weapon.

You can also consume medkits and psi hypos from the favorites wheel.
Psi powers can be quickly accessed using psi targeting mode.
Psi powers can be quickly accessed using psi targeting mode.

Some powers are triggered instantly by pressing %focusmode:mouse_execute_power_type1%. Some powers are targeted. To stop time and enter psi targeting mode, press and hold %focusmode:mouse_execute_power_type1%. Use %focusmode:mouse_menu_rotate_yaw% to aim. Release %focusmode:mouse_execute_power_type1% to execute power on the targeted location or press %focusmode:mouse_cancel_focusmode_type1% to cancel.

Powers can be equipped from the favorites wheel.

Some powers are triggered instantly by pressing %focusmode:mouse_execute_power_type1%. Some powers are targeted. To stop time and enter psi targeting mode, press and hold %focusmode:mouse_execute_power_type1%. Use %focusmode:mouse_menu_rotate_yaw% to aim. Release %focusmode:mouse_execute_power_type1% to execute power on the targeted location or press %focusmode:mouse_cancel_focusmode_type1% to cancel.

Powers can be equipped from the favorites wheel.

Some powers are triggered instantly by pressing %focusmode:controller_execute_power% . Some powers are targeted. To stop time and enter psi targeting mode, press and hold %focusmode:controller_execute_power%. Use %focusmode:controller_right_menu_rotate_yaw% to aim. Release %focusmode:controller_execute_power% to execute a psi power on the targeted location or %focusmode:controller_cancel_psitargeting% to cancel.

Powers can be equipped from the favorites.

Some powers are triggered instantly by pressing %focusmode:controller_execute_power% . Some powers are targeted. To stop time and enter psi targeting mode, press and hold %focusmode:controller_execute_power%. Use %focusmode:controller_right_menu_rotate_yaw% to aim. Release %focusmode:controller_execute_power% to execute a psi power on the targeted location or %focusmode:controller_cancel_psitargeting% to cancel.

Powers can be equipped from the favorites.

Many objects on Talos I can be repaired if you have the Repair skill and enough spare parts.

To repair an object, hold down the %player:specialUse% button until the repair is completed.

Many objects on Talos I can be repaired if you have the Repair skill and enough spare parts.

To repair an object, hold down the %player:specialUse% button until the repair is completed.
Damaged weapons can be repaired if you have the Repair skill and enough Spare Parts. Select the weapon you wish to repair in your inventory and press %menu:menu_examine%. Then choose repair.
Damaged weapons can be repaired if you have the Repair skill and enough Spare Parts. Select the weapon you wish to repair in your inventory and press %menu:menu_examine%. Then choose repair.

Weapon Kits allow you to upgrade your weapons. To use a Weapon Kit, select the weapon you wish to upgrade in your inventory and press %menu:menu_examine%.

Then choose upgrade to select from any available upgrades. Note: some upgrades require advanced skills.

Weapon Kits allow you to upgrade your weapons. To use a Weapon Kit, select the weapon you wish to upgrade in your inventory and press %menu:menu_examine%.

Then choose upgrade to select from any available upgrades. Note: some upgrades require advanced skills.
Use the GLOO cannon to immobilize enemies for a short period of time. Immobilized enemies take bonus damage.
Use the GLOO cannon to immobilize enemies for a short period of time. Immobilized enemies take bonus damage.

The TranStar GLOO Cannon (Gelifoam Lattice Organism Obstructor) disables and/or immobilizes targets without harming them. GLOO can extinguish flames and temporarily stop electric arcs. When hardened, GLOO can also be used as a climbable platform.

Press %player:attack1% to fire your GLOO Cannon. Press and hold %player:attack1% to fire a continuous stream.

The TranStar GLOO Cannon (Gelifoam Lattice Organism Obstructor) disables and/or immobilizes targets without harming them. GLOO can extinguish flames and temporarily stop electric arcs. When hardened, GLOO can also be used as a climbable platform.

Press %player:attack1% to fire your GLOO Cannon. Press and hold %player:attack1% to fire a continuous stream.
The Recycler Charge recycles junk, aliens, and humans in its proximity. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.
The Recycler Charge recycles junk, aliens, and humans in its proximity. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.

When detonated, the Recycler Charge breaks down the molecular structure of nearby objects into recyclable material.

Your uniform offers some degree of protection, but is not failsafe. Standing too close can prove hazardous.

Recycler Charges can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%.

When detonated, the Recycler Charge breaks down the molecular structure of nearby objects into recyclable material.

Your uniform offers some degree of protection, but is not failsafe. Standing too close can prove hazardous.

Recycler Charges can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%.
Use %player:attack1% to fire your Q-Beam and %player:reload% to reload.
Use %player:attack1% to fire your Q-Beam and %player:reload% to reload.

The Q-Beam fires a concentrated beam of unstable particles that will eventually cause a target to explode.

Use %player:attack1% to fire your rifle and %player:reload% to reload.

The Q-Beam fires a concentrated beam of unstable particles that will eventually cause a target to explode.

Use %player:attack1% to fire your rifle and %player:reload% to reload.
Use %player:attack1% to fire your pistol and %player:reload% to reload.
Use %player:attack1% to fire your pistol and %player:reload% to reload.

The TranStar PPN-8 Pistol is the standard issue weapon for all TranStar security personnel. Small, fast, and quiet, this pistol provides satisfactory damage while maintaining a degree of stealth.

Use %player:attack1% to fire your pistol and %player:reload% to reload.

The TranStar PPN-8 Pistol is the standard issue weapon for all TranStar security personnel. Small, fast, and quiet, this pistol provides satisfactory damage while maintaining a degree of stealth.

Use %player:attack1% to fire your pistol and %player:reload% to reload.
Use %player:attack1% to fire your shotgun and %player:reload% to reload.
Use %player:attack1% to fire your shotgun and %player:reload% to reload.

The Throne Tactical Shotgun provides maximum damage at close range. Effectiveness falls off significantly at longer range.

Use %player:attack1% to fire your shotgun and %player:reload% to reload.

The Throne Tactical Shotgun provides maximum damage at close range. Effectiveness falls off significantly at longer range.

Use %player:attack1% to fire your shotgun and %player:reload% to reload.
The Disruptor Stun Gun is useful for incapacitating enemies without killing them. Hold %player:attack1% to charge your stun gun and release to fire. Use %player:reload% to reload.
The Disruptor Stun Gun is useful for incapacitating enemies without killing them. Hold %player:attack1% to charge your stun gun and release to fire. Use %player:reload% to reload.
Hold %player:attack1% to charge your stun gun and release to fire. Use %player:reload% to reload.
Hold %player:attack1% to charge your stun gun and release to fire. Use %player:reload% to reload.

The Disruptor Stun Gun will knock out human targets. Typhon are more resistant but can still be temporarily stunned. Robotic devices can also be temporarily disabled, and ultimately destroyed by the Disruptor.

Hold %player:attack1% to charge your stun gun and release to fire. Use %player:reload% to reload.

The Disruptor Stun Gun will knock out human targets. Typhon are more resistant but can still be temporarily stunned. Robotic devices can also be temporarily disabled, and ultimately destroyed by the Disruptor.

Hold %player:attack1% to charge your stun gun and release to fire. Use %player:reload% to reload.
The Nullwave Transmitter blocks psi powers. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.
The Nullwave Transmitter blocks psi powers. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.

Developed in Psychotronics, the Nullwave Transmitter emits a burst of signals which suppress the psionic abilities of anyone caught in the blast for a short period of time.

It can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%.

Developed in Psychotronics, the Nullwave Transmitter emits a burst of signals which suppress the psionic abilities of anyone caught in the blast for a short period of time.

It can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%.

The Hephaestus "Heffy" Twist and Loop Handle Wrench is standard issue for all maintenance personnel employed in TranStar facilities. Good for liberal application of percussive maintenance and mechanical agitation.

Use %player:attack1% to swing your wrench. Important: Press and hold %player:attack1% to charge your attack for maximum damage.

All wrench attacks will drain your stamina.

The Hephaestus "Heffy" Twist and Loop Handle Wrench is standard issue for all maintenance personnel employed in TranStar facilities. Good for liberal application of percussive maintenance and mechanical agitation.

Use %player:attack1% to swing your wrench. Important: Press and hold %player:attack1% to charge your attack for maximum damage.

All wrench attacks will drain your stamina.
The EMP Charge is useful against robots and electronics. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.
The EMP Charge is useful against robots and electronics. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.

The EMP Charge emits a large burst of electromagnetic energy. Highly effective against robots, turrets, and other electrical-based entities.

It can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%.

The EMP Charge emits a large burst of electromagnetic energy. Highly effective against robots, turrets, and other electrical-based entities.

It can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%.
The Typhon Lure will attract nearby aliens to its location. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.
The Typhon Lure will attract nearby aliens to its location. Use %player:attack1% to throw or affix it to stationary objects.

A Typhon Lure (a.k.a. Nightlight) emits a psycholuminescent signal that entices Typhon to move toward the lure for a short period of time. Combine with other weapons or tactics to escape, ambush, or observe Typhon from a safe distance.

It can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%

A Typhon Lure (a.k.a. Nightlight) emits a psycholuminescent signal that entices Typhon to move toward the lure for a short period of time. Combine with other weapons or tactics to escape, ambush, or observe Typhon from a safe distance.

It can be thrown, or affixed to stationary objects using %player:attack1%
This Huntress Boltcaster is harmless, but still has its uses. Use %player:attack1% to fire it and %player:reload% to reload.
This Huntress Boltcaster is harmless, but still has its uses. Use %player:attack1% to fire it and %player:reload% to reload.

The Huntress Boltcaster launches foam darts which do zero damage. Also known for its ability to annoy coworkers, distract enemies, and remotely trigger buttons and screens. Use %player:attack1% to fire your toy gun and %player:reload% to reload.

The Huntress Boltcaster launches foam darts which do zero damage. Also known for its ability to annoy coworkers, distract enemies, and remotely trigger buttons and screens. Use %player:attack1% to fire your toy gun and %player:reload% to reload.
Recyclers convert unwanted items into Synthetic, Mineral, Organic, and Exotic material which can be used by Fabricators to construct new items.
Recyclers convert unwanted items into Synthetic, Mineral, Organic, and Exotic material which can be used by Fabricators to construct new items.

Security stations monitor all Talos I personnel assigned to an area. Selecting an employee's name will unlock an objective with tracking information, assuming their tracking bracelet is still transmitting.

Security stations monitor all Talos I personnel assigned to an area. Selecting an employee's name will unlock an objective with tracking information, assuming their tracking bracelet is still transmitting.

Many TranStar employees have private workstations. Locked stations require a password. Search the environment for clues, or use the hacking ability to bypass the login. Workstations may contain email, files to download, or special utilities.

Many TranStar employees have private workstations. Locked stations require a password. Search the environment for clues, or use the hacking ability to bypass the login. Workstations may contain email, files to download, or special utilities.

Talos I is open for you to explore. From the Lobby, you can reach other parts of the space station via the bulkhead doors and lifts. You may return to the Lobby and other areas you’ve discovered as often as you like to complete optional objectives.

Talos I is open for you to explore. From the Lobby, you can reach other parts of the space station via the bulkhead doors and lifts. You may return to the Lobby and other areas you’ve discovered as often as you like to complete optional objectives.
Some types of damage will result in serious trauma.
Some types of damage will result in serious trauma.

Some types of damage will result in serious trauma. To remove a trauma visit, a Medical Operator or use the appropriate pharmaceutical.

Press %player:togglepda% to open your TranScribe and view your current status.

Some types of damage will result in serious trauma. To remove a trauma visit, a Medical Operator or use the appropriate pharmaceutical.

Press %player:togglepda% to open your TranScribe and view your current status.

Some types of damage you sustain will result in serious trauma. To remove a trauma, visit a Medical Operator or use the appropriate pharmaceutical.

Press %player:togglestatus% to open your TranScribe and view your current status.

Some types of damage you sustain will result in serious trauma. To remove a trauma, visit a Medical Operator or use the appropriate pharmaceutical.

Press %player:togglestatus% to open your TranScribe and view your current status.
Combat Focus available. Hold %player:combat_focus% to focus.
Combat Focus available. Hold %player:combat_focus% to focus.
Combat Focus available. Hold %player:combat_focus% to focus.
Combat Focus available. Hold %player:combat_focus% to focus.

Combat Focus enhances your overall abilities. When active, time slows around you and actions cost less stamina. At higher levels, your combat damage will also increase. Combat Focus can be equipped from the Favorites Wheel.

Combat Focus enhances your overall abilities. When active, time slows around you and actions cost less stamina. At higher levels, your combat damage will also increase. Combat Focus can be equipped from the Favorites Wheel.
Talos I has multiple airlocks which lead to the exterior of the space station.
Talos I has multiple airlocks which lead to the exterior of the space station.

Talos I has multiple airlocks which lead to the exterior of the space station. Before you can use them, you have to disengage their manual seals from the inside. The more airlocks you find, the more freedom you'll have to navigate through and around the station as you wish. Access your TranScribe to view your station map to find more airlocks.

Talos I has multiple airlocks which lead to the exterior of the space station. Before you can use them, you have to disengage their manual seals from the inside. The more airlocks you find, the more freedom you'll have to navigate through and around the station as you wish. Access your TranScribe to view your station map to find more airlocks.
Your TranStar uniform and Psychoscope can be upgraded with chipsets that provide benefits, boosts, and protections.
Your TranStar uniform and Psychoscope can be upgraded with chipsets that provide benefits, boosts, and protections.

Your TranStar uniform and Psychoscope can be upgraded with chipsets that provide various benefits, boosts, and protections. Install chipsets on the Suit Chipsets and Scope Chipsets pages within the Inventory tab of your Transcribe.

Your TranStar uniform and Psychoscope can be upgraded with chipsets that provide various benefits, boosts, and protections. Install chipsets on the Suit Chipsets and Scope Chipsets pages within the Inventory tab of your Transcribe.

Most enemies aboard Talos I are stronger than you - at least initially. Before attacking head on, try gaining an advantage by disabling them first. Freeze your enemies in place with GLOO or the Disruptor Stun Gun. Block them from using powers with Nullwave Transmitters or the Psychoshock ability. Drop EMP Charges to stun robotic opponents.

Enemies always take bonus damage when they are disabled. Experiment to create your own deadly combos.

Most enemies aboard Talos I are stronger than you - at least initially. Before attacking head on, try gaining an advantage by disabling them first. Freeze your enemies in place with GLOO or the Disruptor Stun Gun. Block them from using powers with Nullwave Transmitters or the Psychoshock ability. Drop EMP Charges to stun robotic opponents.

Enemies always take bonus damage when they are disabled. Experiment to create your own deadly combos.
Thank you for preordering Prey. Your preorder items can be found in the special container in Morgan's office.
Thank you for preordering Prey. Your preorder items can be found in the special container in Morgan's office.

Your suit integrity is compromised. You will continue to lose oxygen (O2) until you use a Suit Patch Kit to repair your suit. Oxygen can be replenished with O2 Canisters or at Oxygen Refill Stations around the Talos I exterior.

Your suit integrity is compromised. You will continue to lose oxygen (O2) until you use a Suit Patch Kit to repair your suit. Oxygen can be replenished with O2 Canisters or at Oxygen Refill Stations around the Talos I exterior.
Your suit is damaged. The better condition your suit is in, the more damage it will absorb from enemy attacks and hazards. Use a Suit Repair Kit to repair your suit.
Your suit is damaged. The better condition your suit is in, the more damage it will absorb from enemy attacks and hazards. Use a Suit Repair Kit to repair your suit.

You've been hit by an arc of electricity from a broken Electric Junction. GLOO temporarily stops the arcing electricity long enough for you to use Repair II or bypass the hazard entirely.

Broken Electric Junctions will damage your enemies as well.

You've been hit by an arc of electricity from a broken Electric Junction. GLOO temporarily stops the arcing electricity long enough for you to use Repair II or bypass the hazard entirely.

Broken Electric Junctions will damage your enemies as well.

Talos I is once again waiting for you. You will be able to regain all of the abilities you had in your previous playthrough when you acquire the Psychoscope that has been placed in the cabinet in Morgan's office. Good luck!

Talos I is once again waiting for you. You will be able to regain all of the abilities you had in your previous playthrough when you acquire the Psychoscope that has been placed in the cabinet in Morgan's office. Good luck!
Climb up or over objects using %player:jump%
Climb up or over objects using %player:jump%
Pick up consumable items for later use with %player:use% or consume immediately by holding %player:specialUse%
Pick up consumable items for later use with %player:use% or consume immediately by holding %player:specialUse%
While sneaking you can crawl into even smaller spaces with %player:sneak%. Damage is increased when you attack an unaware enemy.
While sneaking you can crawl into even smaller spaces with %player:sneak%. Damage is increased when you attack an unaware enemy.
Flight controls are disabled when disrupted by EMP.
Flight controls are disabled when disrupted by EMP.
Keycodes and keycards can be found throughout Talos I to open doors and safes. Not all codes and cards are in the same area.
Keycodes and keycards can be found throughout Talos I to open doors and safes. Not all codes and cards are in the same area.
Check for threats before rounding a corner with lean. Lean left with %player:leanleft% and lean right with %player:leanright%
Check for threats before rounding a corner with lean. Lean left with %player:leanleft% and lean right with %player:leanright%
Hold %player:use% to pick up multiple items.
Hold %player:use% to pick up multiple items.
Carry objects with %player:use%, drop a carried object with %player:use% or throw it with %player:attack1%
Carry objects with %player:use%, drop a carried object with %player:use% or throw it with %player:attack1%
Hold %player:jump% while falling to glide or slow your descent.
Hold %player:jump% while falling to glide or slow your descent.
Your health is low. Consume a Medkit to restore health.
Your health is low. Consume a Medkit to restore health.
Your psi is low. Consume a psi hypo to restore psi points.
Your psi is low. Consume a psi hypo to restore psi points.
Add weapons to your inventory with %player:use% or equip immediately by holding %player:specialUse%
Add weapons to your inventory with %player:use% or equip immediately by holding %player:specialUse%
Your TranStar uniform and psychoscope can be upgraded with chipsets. Install new chipsets via the inventory screen of your TranScribe.

Thank you for completing the Prey demo. Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of Talos I? Your Mind. The Station. Earth Itself. Nothing is Safe from the Alien Threat.

Fight the Invasion on Friday, May 5th 2017.

Preorder now to get the Exclusive Cosmonaut Shotgun Starter Pack, consisting of Morgan Yu’s family heirloom Margrave shotgun and tools to fight threats aboard Talos I including: three Neuromods players can spend to acquire new abilities, two Medkits, a Fabrication plan to create the Shotgun and Ammo, a starter kit for building tools and weapons, and a unique upgrade to help players preserve their limited resources.
